website_summaries.verdict: While this ankle brace has plenty of support for injured ankles, the limited sizing options may be a dealbreaker for some.
pros: Those suffering from acute and chronic injuries will appreciate the faster recovery time that this ankle brace affords
The ankle remains sufficiently protected despite the comfortable open heel design
cons: This brace only comes in one size, which is inconvenient for those with feet that are smaller or larger than normal

customer_reviews.title: Saved my run
customer_reviews.text: These braces are saving my morning run! They provide optimal support for my weak ankles. I run in them 3 times a week 7 miles. I’ve been a runner for almost 7 years and never had an issue until this past June. I began feeling pain in each of my ankles on the inside and outside at random times on both ankles. I was forced to practically walk at the pace I needed to stay comfortable. So I bought these braces and for over 2 weeks I’ve been getting my pace back up! I’m not running with an injury, just weakness. But I highly recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: One size fits most, and very well.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Purchased for myself to help with recovering during cross training. Has a great fit and I'm in a size 13 shoe. My daughter now uses for gymnastics(Sz 4 kids) and it fits her pretty good as well. Seems to be very well constructed and the Velcro has a good hold. This is very soft and comfortable. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: I cannot recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for achillies tendinitis/plantar fasciitis. I had high hopes for this brace but it caused my heal constant pain vs relief. This product is thicker than anticipated no matter how you wrap it and it comes down a little far on my foot. If you want to wear it with skinny/slim leg jeans, no...or sandals, nope. The main goal is to be able to wear it for pain relief no matter the clothes or shoes you wear. In my case it doesn't work. Therefore, I bought a different, less expensive one and it eases my pain. I can put wear it all day and can put weight on my heel.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Williams

customer_reviews.title: Not for a small foot
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 6.5 shoe. I bought the S/M. Oddly, I could not get the brace snug even though it has velcro. When I flexed my foot the hole where the velcro crosses over in the front pinched my skin and rubbed my surgical incision. For a small size, it should be contoured more with less fabric to give the support needed.
customer_reviews.author: JCullen

customer_reviews.title: Worked for my ongoing pain
customer_reviews.text: Fit well and definitely helped to relieve my ongoing pain in my foot. I've had issues with my feet for some time. It was made worse by wearing heels at work and going upstairs and down stairs building to building. I never got my foot looked at by ortho. I decided to try this because it was inexpensive and I started to worry more about my physical well being as I get older after seeing my elderly mother have issues walking because of bad knees. This really worked. I haven't had pain in my foot after wearing it. And I can wear heels again without fear of pain. I just know now to not abuse my feet.
customer_reviews.author: jai maria

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded Expectations (Great Price Too)
customer_reviews.text: I had my doubts about these, but I couldn't have been more wrong! These are tremendous. From the images, they looked bulky, but I am wearing them right now under my shoe without any discomfort. They are sturdy and the velcro straps allow you to adjust the tightness to your liking. As an added bonus, they are also much cheaper than the alternatives. In fact I bought a non-strap alternative for $15 and haven't liked it nearly as much.
customer_reviews.author: J. Fister

customer_reviews.title: Happy Ankles and Feet When I Wear These Supports!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these Ankle Supports to help with arthritis pain in my feet and Have to say that they do help. The degree of support that you get from them is easily adjustable and the braces are comfortable to wear. They do add bulk to my ankles making them a bit hard to wear with some of my shoes and boots but work well with sneakers and even more comfortable when worn barefooted with just socks. Since I do not like to wear shoes in the house, I was missing the support of my shoes. These fill in for me when I want to go shoeless and offer superior support even compared to my New Balance shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Bex

customer_reviews.title: Supportive but runs small
customer_reviews.text: I have very flat feet and brought these to help with my PF problem as I increased my waking. I have very small ankles and these run small even though I purchased a size Large. I bought two one for each foot and the straps of one is at least an inch longer than the other. Overall a fair to good brace but it can cut your circulation esp. in the afternoon after wearing all day so you may have to adjust straps because feet swell as the day goes on.
customer_reviews.author: AlwaysAmazondw88

customer_reviews.title: One small flaw
customer_reviews.text: The material and basic design for this product is excellent with one exception. I had to enlarge the hole for the heel because it was cutting into my heel and causing a great deal of pain. Fortunately, the fabric is such that this can be done with scissors and there is no fraying to be dealt with. After enlarging the hole, it worked great and is very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Mari Silver

customer_reviews.title: Wear it on sock would be better. My ankle is not as pain with this ...
customer_reviews.text: My ankle hurt while I am walking, that's why I bought this ankle support. It came promptly from Amazon. The wrap fits my feet, it is tight, supportive and secure my feet while I move around. Wear it on sock would be better. My ankle is not as pain with this wrap on it. Nice product and price range. I am shoe size 9 and fits well for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... same time tight to a point where it is comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my ankle secure and at the same time tight to a point where it is comfortable .
customer_reviews.author: JO-E-Z

customer_reviews.title: Worth it. Very comfortable, great support.
customer_reviews.text: I sprained my ankle. I had to ware an air cast for a few days but switched to this support. So glad I did because I wasn't bulky, was just the right thickness and even after hand washing, held its form and stayed strong. I especially like the crossover straps at the base of the leg because this was the heart of the support and worked so well. The support is so good and yet material so comfortable and not bulky that I can wear a shoe or sneaker with it without problems. I tried a similar one but it was too bulky. This one is very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Great ankle support!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great ankle support! It is easy to put on, with or without a sock. Easy to adjust for just the right tightness. Fabric is comfortable. Washable. I do notice the seam under my arch when walking, not painful just aware of it. After 2 months in a fracture boot for a fibula fracture, this provides the support I need. The brace from the ortho doc was very difficult to use and fit poorly. I ordered 4 different support braces on Amazon and this Bracoo is my favorite! Arrived fast and at a good price!
customer_reviews.author: SNRNAZ

customer_reviews.title: This is an awesome ankle brace
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome ankle brace. I use this all the time after I had an injury and the tendons in my foot really start hurting. This offers a light weight solution that gives enough support to help. Recently bought a 2nd one for my wife who has also loved using as she had ankle surgery.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Myers

customer_reviews.title: Much better then the ankle support I had been using
customer_reviews.text: Much better then the ankle support I had been using. Easy to put on. Suggest not making it extremely tight until your ankle gets used to it. I wore it with high topped sneakers and it was fine. Very helpful after a full day walking in NYC
customer_reviews.author: robert moore

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!! Had replacement ankle surgery 6 month ago ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent!! Had replacement ankle surgery 6 month ago and further complications with another torn tendon and arthritis in my ankle joint. I wore this brace when going on a trip to the beach. Was able to walk in the sand with it and swam every day. It worked very well!! Bought 2 more.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia

customer_reviews.title: I really like this Brace because it is very comfortable and i ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like this Brace because it is very comfortable and i really needed something to wear around the house so that im not barefoot. I broke my Ankle really badly five years ago and has been a problem for me ever since. So i purchased this in hope i could get more support while im not in my shoes. I have been wearing this for almost a month now and i must say it has done alot of good for me! Gives me the support i need so that i don't walk barefoot and in pain. I do not wear them in my tennis shoes because those are supportive enough.
customer_reviews.author: HollyAnn N.

customer_reviews.title: good product with a caveat...
customer_reviews.text: I bought the support to help brace my ankle while playing badminton. The strap itself allows me to wrap the ankle with enough tension. However, the material love the bottom of my foot bothers/hurts when I move around. I had to taken them off, and it was extremely uncomfortable while I was playing. However, my older son recently had a high ankle sprain and was on crutches for two weeks. He put the strap on when he was moving around with his crutches, and it make him quite a bit more comfortable. So in summary, it is a good product, but not if you are actively moving around while wearing it.
customer_reviews.author: Ratatouille

customer_reviews.title: Originally I had purchased a flimsy wrapfrom the local Fred Meyer that didn't really do much - it was more like a thick sock tha
customer_reviews.text: I bought this ankle support after a sprained my ankle playing softball. Originally I had purchased a flimsy wrapfrom the local Fred Meyer that didn't really do much - it was more like a thick sock than anything. This support is a bit different. Pros: - Provides great ankle support. - Fully adjustable. Should fit the most swollen of ankles. - Pretty comfortable for it is Cons: - A bit bulky. This is not a low-profile wrap. - Caused a blister in the back of my foot after wearing this while exercising. - It became very smelly, very quickly. Supposed to hand-wash this, but I had to use the washing machine to get out the food odor.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Jeff

customer_reviews.title: I would buy it again!!
customer_reviews.text: It has been one month since I purchased this item. I should have gotten it sooner. Better than the one I used from my doctor. Can have it as tight or as loose when I need it. Fits just fine in my work boot or in my running shoe. I will buy another if and when I need an additional one.
customer_reviews.author: phillip

customer_reviews.title: I've been wearing this brace for 2 weeks and am amazed by how much better my ankle feels
customer_reviews.text: I've been struggling with an Achilles injury for over a year now. I've been wearing this brace for 2 weeks and am amazed by how much better my ankle feels! I finally have hope that this injury may actually heal. PS: I did have to trim down the 2 Velcro tabs on the major straps (across top of foot and around upper ankle). The tabs are a touch too wide and they always seemed to hang over the edge a bit which allowed them to dig into my skin. Now that they are shaped a bit better (no loss of functionality!), they are perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Ursula

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I hurt my feet like 6 months ago. A wall decorative ceramic heavy cross fell on my feet and ever since my left foot hurts a lot. I decided to get this brace to try to help ease the pain and it does help a lot. It doesn't make it go away entirely but it does help.
customer_reviews.author: Ilya

customer_reviews.title: Good support for my ankle and foot
customer_reviews.text: I had my foot fractured close to my ankle. Was wearing a boot, prescribed by the doctor for some time. After 4 weeks doctor was okay to wear any other footwear. Especially I wanted some protection to wear at home and this product fitted my bill quite well. In fact, this ankle support gave me more protection and support than my boot with comforts, which I was missing in my boot, that too at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Veerappan

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: I've been pleased with this ankle support. After breaking my ankle this summer and unfortunately spending more than 3 months in a cast and boot, my ankle was very weak. We live in a rural area with a lot of outdoor area that isn't level and plenty of natural hazards which explains how easy it was to severely break my ankle to begin with after coming face to face with a skunk in the dark. This gave a quick answer for support and piece of mind until I get the ankle strong again and is so much better than constant wrapping or taping.
customer_reviews.author: M. Watson

customer_reviews.title: Good support witout limiting too much motion. Great for soft tissue injuries on the mend.
customer_reviews.text: Great support without too much bulk. Got this for a soft tissue injury that is taking a long time to heal and needs the ankle stabilizec but not too limited in motion. This does the job. It is comfortable and can be adjusted. If you have a skinny foot and ankle, it might flare a it on the sides when you cross the top flaps but it does not interfere and can go inside most shoes if they're not too form fitting. Much better than ace bandages all the time, and I can take it on and off as needed through the day. Good.
customer_reviews.author: Annie M.

customer_reviews.title: Not for everyone.
customer_reviews.text: This item seems to be for a "light" application. The straps that complete the figure 8 don't really give the ankle much support at all. The hole where the heel goes is not for everybody. I personally have an issues with it & stop several times a day to give my foot a rest. I would not buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: RKG

customer_reviews.title: Amazing ankle brace
customer_reviews.text: I've always had strong ankles, a couple of weeks ago I rolled it a few times successively and started to have some issues. I purchased this brace as a lightweight, adjustable, brace that I could wear while playing sports. I had never worn an ankle brace, as soon as I put this on it felt like it was 'hugging' my ankle, making it feel better right away. I could feel that it VERY slightly restricted movement. It helped me to make it through a full day tournament of Ultimate Frisbee without any issues or complaints. The materials of this are perfect. I really can't say enough good things.
customer_reviews.author: Brian R. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS!
customer_reviews.text: I have RA, which means my joints ache/hurt a lot. I wear a size 7 US shoe so I ordered the S/M. This brace is not only adjustable but also comfortable enough to wear to bed at night and provided great support. And it is very inexpensive! I am going to buy another one for my other ankle. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: MaryInAlabama

customer_reviews.title: The brace fit over my sock and was very comfortable while still providing good support and decent mobility
customer_reviews.text: The product just arrived today. I live an active lifestyle that is often interrupted by ankle injuries. I normally use a long cloth wrap and don't bother with fitted wraps or braces, but this was a pleasant surprise. The brace fit over my sock and was very comfortable while still providing good support and decent mobility. If you are looking for an immobilizing brace, this is not the right product, but it is great for added support and allows movement for activity. I would be wary of your ankle is plus size as the brace may not fit.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Bounds

customer_reviews.title: This brace exceeded my expectations
customer_reviews.text: I bought three different braces not knowing which would support my ankle best during my tennis play. I've had a severe ankle sprain and this brace works great. It's very supportive but not restrictive and my tennis shoes lace up without a problem while this is on. It works well and has been durable.
customer_reviews.author: Billy D. Baker

customer_reviews.title: Great for after walking boot
customer_reviews.text: This has been really helpful after my daughter sprained her foot. When she got out of the walking boot, this gave her enough support to begin walking and doing therapy.
customer_reviews.author: roxiejewel

customer_reviews.title: Ideal for post foot surgery support
customer_reviews.text: I cannot praise this product highly enough! I had major foot surgery 4 months ago and was greatly concerned about my ability to live the active life-style I enjoyed prior to the surgery. This product enabled me to climb ancient ruins and do extensive walking over uneven terrain without stressing my foot. It is lightweight and fit easily into my shoes. It is fully adjustable on several dimensions so I could fit it to my foot perfectly. Waterproof and breathable meant that I could snorkel as well without injuring the scar tissue. I could not do any of these activities without the comfortable yet strong support of this product. If they had multiple colors, I'd buy them all!
customer_reviews.author: JCG

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I recently injured my foot and I think it is my achilles. This brace has been great to support my achilles and get me back to working out. I wear it almost all day with no discomfort. It fits in my shoe just fine. I would recommend this to anyone that has an issue with their foot and needs support to lessen the discomfort.
customer_reviews.author: BryanS

customer_reviews.title: No Foot Surgery For Me!
customer_reviews.text: Was my second purchase of this Ankle support product. Really works well. I could barely walk because my feet hurt so much (especially after sleeping). I put this on and could instantly feel the support. It made my pain go away. I was worried because I didn't want to see a Podiatrist and have surgery. (Don't know if said Podiatrist would have made me have foot surgery or not - but, they have a reputation of insisting on surgery.) Got this Bracoo ankle support & didn't need surgery!
customer_reviews.author: M. Armbrust

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is wrong and no returns offered
customer_reviews.text: Sizing is completely wrong. I ordered the small since I measured 10" and it said up to 12". It is way to small. Just noticed also that the seller does not accept returns. Now I am stuck with something that won't fit. Find something else.
customer_reviews.author: UT Kilts

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome, awesome straps! I'm on my feet all day at my job, walking on concrete floors, so I bought these after feeling so much pain in my ankles and feet after my 10 hour shifts. Combined with my work boots with insoles, these supports are fantastic! They fit me and I'm a size 9 in Men's, and are so easy to adjust since they're Velcro. Just be sure to keep them comfortable and not too tight, your feet will swell up while you're working anyway, so this way you avoid slowing down circulation of the blood! Now, after my shifts at work I have taken away at least 80% of the pain, which in my world is perfect :)
customer_reviews.author: Antonio

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for my current situation, but very sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: I have achilles tendonitis. I thought this might help lessen the discomfort by not letting me move it too much. Unfortunately something about what I have got going on and the way this wrapped made the bottom of my foot hurt too. The physical therapist was not surprised. So I have to use tape to set it differently and have it a little more flexible in parts. It is well made and the velcro seems good. It just didn't work for my situation this time. Will keep for future use.
customer_reviews.author: Max S.Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Braces are comfortable and give fairly good support
customer_reviews.text: Braces are comfortable and give fairly good support. After breaking an ankle and recovering, I wear these on both ankles while hiking in trail shoes. This is my second pair. The only thing is that the heel circle is small and cuts into my foot, but I fixed it by just cutting the circle bigger with scissors.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT
customer_reviews.text: MY FRIEND HAS VERRY VERY VERY BAD ANKLES DUE TO BREAKS IN ANKLE AND ARTHRITIS. I BOUGHT SEVERAL PAIR OF THESE SO HE COULD CHANGE AND NOT STRETCH THEM OUT QUICKLY. HE LOVES THEM, RSATHER THAN THE ORTHAPEDIC HIS DOCTOR GAVE HIM TO WEAR. I WILL BUY MORE BECAUSE HE TRULY IS A HAPPIER WALKER NOW.
customer_reviews.author: PATTY WAINWRIGHT

customer_reviews.title: effective immediately!!
customer_reviews.text: I twisted my left ankle last year during a hike and it has been reappear from time to time during the year. It came a week ago after a 7 mile running. I had hard time walking and it persisted for two days so I decided to order this support from Amazon. After put it on I felt that I can walk better and after a day the pain is relieved. Now I decide to keep it on my foot for couple more days until it's recovered.
customer_reviews.author: T400

customer_reviews.title: Bulky with little support
customer_reviews.text: Almost worthless. Doesn't form to your ankle and you're left with dog tags on each side of your ankle. Support is minimal and it's bulky and uncomfortable. Worst part is, I can't even return it
customer_reviews.author: Jamie G

customer_reviews.title: good support for minor sprain
customer_reviews.text: This brace is something I have been looking for after I sprained my ankle and needed a little more support - especially when i was somewhere I had to walk a lot - or go up stairs. it fits low on my ankle and my foot still fits in a shoe! good support for minor sprain!
customer_reviews.author: Aneesah McNamee

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: I thought it would be a little larger than my Mueller, but it was actually a bit smaller. The edging was uncomfortable even with thicker socks and sneakers, and I soon removed it all with a seam ripper. I recommend the Mueller if this is all the support you need. If you really need stability, I recommend the ASO Stabilizer.
customer_reviews.author: Spots

customer_reviews.title: I did recently notice that I have to pull the straps a little tighter because it seems like it is losing it's elasticity
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing it for about a month and for a soft brace it is quite supportive and does not take up extra room in your shoe. I did recently notice that I have to pull the straps a little tighter because it seems like it is losing it's elasticity.
customer_reviews.author: Sandeman

customer_reviews.title: Wide degree of adjustability
customer_reviews.text: It fits well and provides good support. I only put it on in the evenings when I am reclining so I can not really speak to how well it would hold up to being walked on all day. The velcro makes it very adjustable so you can leave it a little loose and place the two straps lower on the ankle to allow more freedom of movement or you can place the straps higher and keep the ankle firmly in place.
customer_reviews.author: Scott C.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and secure
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I thought the extra 2 straps in the front of the ankle brace were going to add a lot of bulk, but it doesn't feel any different than my last ankle brace. I only use this when playing basketball. I totally recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: SteDubs

customer_reviews.title: Feels wonderful!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried various ankle braces on the market for my ankles which were basically ruined working for USPS delivering mail up and down thousands of cement steps 6 days a week for a year and half. I thought my life was over when I was experiencing ankle pain daily, however, a nightly ritual with this ankle wrap has made a difference already and I feel like I can go longer in a regular day if I have to be on my feet! They are comfortable and close up snuggly without feeling like your circulation is cut off. They do not itch and they seem sturdy. I'm very pleased and will buy a second one soon! :)
customer_reviews.author: Marie33kl

customer_reviews.title: It works great. I like that your able to control the ...
customer_reviews.text: I use it for any ankle for support. It works great. I like that your able to control the tightness with the velcro straps. I like it so much I ordred second one. I found you can't wear a completely closed in shoe when wearing this support. When I wear the support I'm only able to wear a mule
customer_reviews.author: BZYbug

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS ANKLE BRACE!
customer_reviews.text: WHILE RECUPERATING FROM AN ANKLE SPRAIN, I TRIED ANOTHER NEOPRENE AND LATEX ANKLE SUPPORT BUT IT HAD STIFF BRACES THAT AGGRAVATED MY ANKLE BONES AND I HAD TO BE CAREFUL THAT THE LATEX DIDN'T TOUCH MY SKIN AS I AM ALLERGIC TO LATEX. I ORDERED THE BRACOO BREATHABLE NEOPRENE ANKLE SUPPORT TO SEE IF IT WOULD BE MORE COMFORTABLE. WHEN IT ARRIVED I TRIED IT ON, BUT THE CIRCULAR HOLE WAS TOO SMALL FOR MY HEEL, SO I CAREFULLY ENLARGED THE HOLE WITH AN ORDINARY SCISSORS UNTIL THE BRACOO SUPPORT FIT COMFORTABLY. IT WORKS GREAT! AND DOESN'T CONTAIN LATEX. IT HAS HELPED STABILIZE MY INJURED ANKLE. I HIGHLY RECOMMEND IT.
customer_reviews.author: jsheed

customer_reviews.title: I have purchased two additional pairs after receiving my first ...
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased two additional pairs after receiving my first. I have arch pain and tendon pain due to flat feet. I wear these over a pair of trouser socks. They truly relieve my pain and allow me to be on my feet all day. I wear these with low shooties and mules for work.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Small and uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Runs small and doesn’t fit well on heel/ankle. Small fits my elbow better. I’d size up if I were to buy again - but i’m Going to look for something more comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Bcre8iv

customer_reviews.title: COMFORT MATTERS - If you don't wear it, it can't help
customer_reviews.text: After 'rolling' my ankle I took a '3 bears' approach to buying braces. One was just not enough support. One was to much and a bit of a pain to wear. The Bracoo was 'just right'. I could wear it all day. I could adjust the snugness to meet my needs. There is a little technique / learning curve to adjusting the velcro straps so the front of your ankle doesn't get pinched as you wear this.
customer_reviews.author: Rock of Ages

customer_reviews.title: Great! Just needed a minor adjustment.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband who plays soccer and has a very messed up ankle to say the least. He loves it! The only issue was that his foot is constantly swollen so the velcro pieces that meet over the foot are too tight if pulled together. Otherwise the hook part of the velcro is against his bare skin. I was able to fix this by sewing on an extra piece of felt, but I would have liked there to be slightly more fabric to cover the foot.
customer_reviews.author: E. Alvarado

customer_reviews.title: I just had ankle surgery and this ankle wrap is great for just messing around the house
customer_reviews.text: I also have the Aircast A60 ankle support. I just had ankle surgery and this ankle wrap is great for just messing around the house. Gives support to the ankle, but not really intended to keep you from turning your ankle. If your looking for an easy ankle wrap for some additional support, this is great. If you're looking for a brace that won't allow you to turn your ankle you'll need to get something sturdier. My A60 is great for that. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. & Mrs. T

customer_reviews.title: This product comes with a clear illustrated instruction and very easy to use and adjust the tightness
customer_reviews.text: I got tendon injures and need the ankle support. This product comes with a clear illustrated instruction and very easy to use and adjust the tightness. It gives a good support and makes my ankle feel comfortable at the same time. I highly recommend the product.
customer_reviews.author: Shih-Ta Chi

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: It won't hold your foot in place, but it does offer good support. I have nerve damage and can no longer hold my foot up, so my foot drops when I hold my foot up, like when I'm walking. This support isn't strong enough to hold my foot up, but it is snug and probably adequate for most support needs. The velcro seems plenty strong. The double wrapped ankle part is quite firm and snug.
customer_reviews.author: Finer Things

customer_reviews.title: Very Helpful!
customer_reviews.text: This was so helpful in allowing my sprained ankle to heal. I would keep it wrapped at night and during the morning while at work. Within a few days of using this, my ankle finally healed. It is also super comfortable. With Ace Bandages, I tend to get a weird prickly feeling or I feel like they are too loose or too tight. This always felt comfortable and supportive.
customer_reviews.author: AshleyTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Good ankle support
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit skeptical of the ankle support before I purchased them. I'm not skeptical at all anymore. I needed ankle support in my left leg but didn't know about it. These support are compact, and keep my ankle centered as at the end of my tennis session, my ankle doesn't hurt anymore. The 2 side straps on these support were a bit longer before. Now they are shortened and I was disappointed. The longer straps gave me confidence in their holding power. I've become a bit skeptical again regarding these straps. Still use them.
customer_reviews.author: M Fong

customer_reviews.title: Relief!
customer_reviews.text: I realized that I needed some support to my ankles while working out because I couldn't hold some stretching positions as long as I should. And my knees were always hurting 2 days after doing deadlifts or squats. What a change! Not only are my knees not barking at me, wearing the brace has stabilized my leg muscles to the point I can lift more weight. I'm going to order another one in the near future as a backup.
customer_reviews.author: G. L. Crittendon

customer_reviews.title: for that weak ankle...
customer_reviews.text: I love my ankle support as it fits perfectly each time and on either foot. It gives me great strength and I feel I could run for ever with that extra support. Considering buying a second one... as I really appreciate the support! Fast and courteous service!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stellar ankle support
customer_reviews.text: This one feels really good. I can walk with it on, and when I sit down again it stays supportive. I wear this to bed at night, and it feels good even in the morning. My foot feels good all day - and that's without the support. I am glad I bought this ankle support, and I will do it again.
customer_reviews.author: KateQ

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable enough for all day wear
customer_reviews.text: I was on medication that caused my tendons to weaken and needed a little extra support. This worked very well. It supported my ankle comfortably, without being too hot or uncomfortable. The material is soft and comfy and it fits well. I can wear it all day without being uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela C. Chesnas

customer_reviews.title: Works, can still be improved
customer_reviews.text: This does help a badly sprained ankle. It fits my large ankle with plenty of room to spare. If I could change anything, it would be: 1) make both sides of the ankle "interiors" covered with cushion for comfort, 2) make it with a more breathable material because it gets hot quickly, even on not-hot days, and 3) give us a few more colors not listed.
customer_reviews.author: ItsArose

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Little Brace
customer_reviews.text: /had to use this after my foot surgery and leave it on for long periods of time. Overall it was very comfy and I liked the fact that I could adjust/loosen it as needed and easily. Great quality, and easy to clean! Also good if you just need the support for minor sporting events.
customer_reviews.author: DeeC

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight with adjustable support
customer_reviews.text: Using this support in the end stages of a badly sprained ankle. The support level is adjustable, and the fabric is fairly breathable so don't find my foot perspiring beneath it. It is comfortable and despite being lightweight, durable. I appreciate the lightweight fabric too since I can finally get into my nice shoes and sandals!
customer_reviews.author: mcerner

customer_reviews.title: Nice support!
customer_reviews.text: Liked the stability. My right ankle is weak and this helps me feel secure and confident when out walking that I won't roll my ankle. I bought a second one for left foot when hiking or try
customer_reviews.author: michelle sanford bethea

customer_reviews.title: Good support.
customer_reviews.text: Great fit. Really supports my ankle. Wish it came in flesh color. I intend to order another one.
customer_reviews.author: az

customer_reviews.title: Does its job
customer_reviews.text: The Bracoo Breathable Neoprene Ankle Support does its job. My requirements were not very severe. Just to control my left foot having a mild sprain. I could put this on and go for a walk. It is not too thick and wearing a shoe is not uncomfortable or difficult. In fact once you start walking it is barely noticeable. Very comfortable in feel and texture. My only complaint is that after a using it only about 20 times, the material around the heel hole has started fraying. Still very useable though. Only the look is not pleasing.
customer_reviews.author: Ybs

customer_reviews.title: Bracco gives you the support you need
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this product. It helped with my ankles when I work out a the gym or from a shift at work. I had no problems at all.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Wollenberg

customer_reviews.title: Worked well for what I needed it.
customer_reviews.text: This ankle brace works well for what I need it to do-- pull my foot to an angle so it's not over stretching one side of my ankle. This brace helped my ankle heal from where I'd pulled something in that spot. It will easily adjust to pull either right or left, depending on the injury site. It also provides added support and stabilization.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: One size fits all, unless your ankle is swollen
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this brace is great. It offers enough support to stabilize mild sprains and adequate compression to help keep swelling down. My only complaint is that I wish it were bigger - though my sprain wasn't severe, my ankle was hugely swollen and it was difficult to get this brace to fit correctly without cutting off circulation. Once the swelling went down, things were fine. Another note - this brace may be thin comparatively, but you'll still struggle to find shoes that you can wear with it.
customer_reviews.author: ERH

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: It is as advertised. I do get up in the middle of the night to tear it off my body, but that is nothing to do with the product -- my foot just feels like it is in a federal penitentiary :(
customer_reviews.author: Cheesy Dong

customer_reviews.title: a very inexpensive help
customer_reviews.text: The brace has done exactly what I purchased it for. After four back surgeries, I experience left foot drop which after time causes much ankle pain. Yet by just using this brace, the pain I experience has decreased . I am very happy I made the purchase. It is very easy to use and is lightweight so once you put it on your ankle, you almost forget it is there. It is a very inexpensive help that I recommend you try if you are experiencing any kind of ankle pain.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent support!
customer_reviews.text: I use this during tennis. Couldn't have asked for a better ankle support. It has helped me from preventing tendinitis/sore tendons, painful wobbly ankles/sprains during my game. I think these would be great for any sport, even dancing.
customer_reviews.author: Sameer Badlani

customer_reviews.title: Great support, not super durable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this brace to wear as I weaned out of a boot cast after I broke my ankle. I've been wearing it all day everyday for about three weeks. The support is great -- it provides stability, prevents swelling, and gives me confidence to walk and do my physical therapy exercises. The downside is that the heel hole has raw edges (not hemmed or sealed) and so it has already begun to tear along the horizontal radius on each side. That's disappointing . . . but the support is so great that I can forgive the short lifespan (I went ahead and bought two more, since I'm sure to wear them out).
customer_reviews.author: Jaymie K Burkhart

customer_reviews.title: Interesting setup not my normal ankle support but I can ...
customer_reviews.text: Interesting setup not my normal ankle support but I can clearly feel the difference and I am Confident of the support they give when I am wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: It is very easy to put on and the breathable material which it ...
customer_reviews.text: I had an injury on my right ankle a few years ago. I tried very complex and expensive braces but they were bothersome and cumbersome. When I saw this ankle support I decided to try it. After a few days of wearing it my ankle pain was almost gone. Now I can stand for long periods of time with no pain or discomfort. It is very easy to put on and the breathable material which it is made of stays cool. I am so happy with it I ordered another one to have.
customer_reviews.author: carlos

customer_reviews.title: I was surprised
customer_reviews.text: I am a 11 year old dancer I injured my ankle and i saw this I was worried because the reviews said it didn’t fit I followed the instructions and it fit perfectly even my 40 year old mother tried it and it fits her too it’s easy to adjust and it’s very comfortable I’m very happy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased
customer_reviews.text: This was a life saver for me particularly when I started working out to help with support while I build muscle and tolerance to activity (I was a bit lazy this winter). My ONLY complaint is that they are a bit uncomfortable to squeeze into shoes. But I will take that discomfort over injuries any day. I have struggled to maintain a work out routine due to Plantar Fasciitis and Shin Splints in the past. The ankle supports helped me avoid that!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BUY THIS
customer_reviews.text: I worked 12 hour shifts I am NOT an athlete.I'm flat footed and have plantar fascitis and i forgot a long name with Tibialis.This works GREAT that I almost never take it OFF. My showed my Ortho doctor this and he said if it works for me it's fine to use.It can fit inside my sneakers well and Not too bulky
customer_reviews.author: Luthstar

customer_reviews.title: Best brace I've tried yet
customer_reviews.text: Best brace I've tried yet. Great support and fits in any shoe. Doesn't get hot. Can hardly feel it on the arch of your foot. It works
customer_reviews.author: Vicki

customer_reviews.title: Works, but not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to hold me over till I could buy my usual ankle brace. While it does the job, I did not like the feel of it. The exposed heel leaves a weird feeling when the rest of your ankle is tightly covered. While it worked for the week I needed it, I would not buy or use it again.
customer_reviews.author: Ashwini Kumar

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This works great and extremely value for money. Haven't seen a more affordable ankle support that works as well. I used on a mountain climbing trip in Indonesia and it really protected my ankles on the return. Particularly, I like it best since I was able to adjust the support level of it by tightening or allowing it to be a little looser.
customer_reviews.author: qozzy

customer_reviews.title: Helpful for tendonitis
customer_reviews.text: It really helps with the tendonitis, but the large is a little too large, the medium a bit too small. And I sure wish that manufacturers of these products would consider a flesh-colored one so that they don't scream, 'look at me' - I'm in pain!
customer_reviews.author: vn dd

customer_reviews.title: More expensive doesn't mean better.
customer_reviews.text: Now this is the brace you want with a severe sprain! No doctor, just this brace. Great support, great compression, great brace. There is another more expensive one out there that works the same way. This one and its price is the one you buy, trust me!
customer_reviews.author: C. Kale

customer_reviews.title: Well Worth the Price.
customer_reviews.text: This is truly a great product, It is very easy to put on and it can be adjusted to any desired pressure.The support is amazing. The Velcro is very well sewed on and it supports the ankle from all sides as well as top and bottom. You can't go wrong guying this product. I have NO issue with recommending this product to those in need of great ankle support.
customer_reviews.author: Jacknyd

customer_reviews.title: This support uses four velcro adjustments which I liked because I could adjust the amount of compression applied ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this after spraining my ankle for a second time while trail running. The doctor told me I needed to apply compression in order to assist with the healing. This support uses four velcro adjustments which I liked because I could adjust the amount of compression applied to various parts of the foot. This support is comfortable and something I was able to wear all day inside of a shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Great fit great support
customer_reviews.text: My wife was injured in a car accident and must wear an ankle brace when she works out. She really likes this one. It's compact and gives a lot of support.
customer_reviews.author: Discerning Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: My 15 year old son had a severe ankle strain, an injury from football, which kept him from being able to play his main sport, tennis. Combined with daily stretching and periodic icing, this support enabled him to return to practicing as his ankle recovered and gained strength.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Pakaluk

customer_reviews.title: Rubs and scratches anterior ankle causing scabs/scarring
customer_reviews.text: Item digs into your anterior ankle and will cause scratches and possibly scarring if worn often. I had to use a foam pad from an old cam boot to help protect my ankle. If you were a women's size 6.5 to 7 size shoe this will be too big for you even as a small.
customer_reviews.author: Jocelynn Rosloniec

customer_reviews.title: For someone in their 20s its nice to have something I know I can use to ...
customer_reviews.text: Finally the thin line compression brace I searched for for everyday relief of pain and swelling due to traumatic damage and resulting arthritis. For someone in their 20s its nice to have something I know I can use to keep my life on track when there are weather changes etc.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin T.

customer_reviews.title: Stiff and bulky.
customer_reviews.text: Super bulky and stiff... I get that maybe be necessary for some situations. I expected a little more flexibility.
customer_reviews.author: Sigourney Gunther

customer_reviews.title: Great support
customer_reviews.text: Love this brace it was so soft and supportive for my ankle would definitely recommend this to others
customer_reviews.author: Panda

customer_reviews.title: NOT ELIGIBLE FOR RETURN.
customer_reviews.text: So mad I didn't read the return policy on this item. This ankle brace is not eligible for return. I wear a size 7 1/2 in flats and 8-8 1/2 in sneakers and flip flops and have small to medium size (female) ankes and I cannot get the velcro far enough over to wear this as it should be worn to go over the fabric so it doesn't scratch my skin. Maybe the next size up would have worked but i'm going to risk spending the money again on this product.
customer_reviews.author: Lily Marie

customer_reviews.title: Horrible product and apparently non refundable!
customer_reviews.text: This product is useless. Does not fit at all like is shows it does unless you have a child sized foot. PLUS there is not much support where it does fit. When I tried to return it I found out it's not eligible for refund!? So I wasted money on a bad product that I'm never going to use.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Schusterman

customer_reviews.title: Great ankle wrap
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality item that I use frequently the Velcro is very secure and I would recommend it if you need a tightly wrapped ankle
customer_reviews.author: William Koczocik

customer_reviews.title: Good support!
customer_reviews.text: Twisted my foot pretty badly, came out of the socket, something snapped, and was all blue. After about 2 weeks the thing was finally looking like a foot again, and I used these bandages, to reduce the swelling. It gives good support. Does hurt when in a tight shoe; but great support when your foot is still a bit feeble from a sprain! Good strong and soft neoprene, and the velcro straps work like ligaments, to keep the foot from leaning down when lifting it up.
customer_reviews.author: H B

customer_reviews.title: Love these.  Really helped my ankles
customer_reviews.text: These are great! Both of my ankles were feeling sore (high school soccer injury) and I put these on every night for a couple hours and my ankles felt better. These are for sure worth the money. I wish I could have worn them with my shoes or soccer cleats but they were a little too thick to feel ok
customer_reviews.author: Jwill

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I've been having trouble with my ankle since I sprained it after the rain here (it gets really slippery on the soil here). This makes my sore ankle more stable and walking easier, than trying to carry mail, cat food and mail with one hand and a walking stick with the other. It's a very big property with a very long drive way.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn M. Newman

customer_reviews.title: Velcro is sharp and uncomfortable- can’t use.
customer_reviews.text: the velcro parts are like really sharp at the edges... so if i even slightly move my foot it hurts bad and cuts into my skin. i tried over a sock too and it didn’t help. super disappointed and i can’t even return it.
customer_reviews.author: cass

product_meta.title: Bracoo Ankle Support, Compression Brace for Arthritis, Pain Relief, Sprains, Sports Injuries and Recovery, Breathable Neoprene Sleeve, FS10, S/M
feature_bullets: FIRM & RELIABLE support for acute injuries such as muscle strain, ligament sprain, or stabilizing weakened ankle joints following surgery

ATHLETE FRIENDLY open-heel design enables broad a range of motion while bracing the plantar flexion, talocrural joint, and Achilles tendon; ideal for injury prevention during running, or playing basketball, football, or soccer
SIMPLE & EFFECTIVE high-grip crisscross straps attach anywhere along the entire sleeve to provide customized tightness and bracing to individual needs

QUALITY NEOPRENE SLEEVE boosts localized blood circulation and provides soothing warmth, accelerating the body’s natural recovery; perforations ensure breathability, meaning it can be worn comfortably underneath socks against the skin throughout the day
VERSATILE DESIGN fits either the left or right foot up to 10” in arch circumference

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
